propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.completed: Mark the step as completed. Is passed to child components.
propDescriptions.icon: The label displayed in the step icon.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

text.description: Styles applied to the SVG text element.

active.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

completed.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

error.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.
